text: kya ve log keval isee kee prateeksha mein hai ki usakee vaastavikata aur parinaam prakat ho jae? jis din usakee vaastavikata saamane aa jaegee, to ve log isase pahale use bhoole hue the, bol uthenge, "vaastav mein, hamaare rab ke rasool saty lekar aae the. to kya hamaare kuchh sifaarishee hai, jo hamaaree sifaarish kar den ya hamen vaapas bhej diya jae ki jo kuchh ham karate the usase bhinn karm karen?" unhonne apane aapako ghaate mein daal diya aur jo kuchh ve jhooth ghadhate the, ve sab unase gum hokar rah gae
